review: This device is so inexpensive, that if you have a wireless router and a television with an HDMI port, you may as well buy it, even if you will only use it occasionally, as I will.  It is VERY easy to install both the hardware and software.  You can use it to stream any video that you can play in the Chrome browser to your television.  If you recorded the wrong show or it was pre-empted or your digital antenna had some interference that day, if the show is available online, you can still watch it on your television.  This to me makes it entirely worth the money.
author: Carol

review: This is easy to use and super portable.  We've taken it on vacation to watch movies at night hotels (we rented from the Google Play store, and it also supports HBOgo and Netflix) and we love that we can use it on multiple TVs at home.  It's a great bang for your buck, and with the AllCast app, you can stream pretty much anything.
